 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 2.5 - INPUT MODALITIES
LABEL IN NAME(LEVEL A)
On accessible websites...

For user interface components with labels that include text or images of text,
the name contains the text that is presented visually.

These websites...

Make it easier for users to operate functionality through various inputs beyond
keyboard.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
Accessible name starts with visible label:The acessible name "Search for a
value" begins with the text of the visible label, "Search". I still don't really
understand
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/label-in-name.html#examples] Web
Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 27 February 2020 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2020/WD-WCAG22-20200227/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/) 

Unsubscribe [https://dwcag.org/unsubscribe]
